idea:
Dwija Foods is a start-up for supply of fresh brewed tea and coffee through Contact-Less vending machines to Corporates.


We are India's first manufacturers of Contact-Less vending machines.


The brews are freshly made and not pre mixed. These machines operate through your smart phones and provide Zero touch dispensing. 


We have tied up with tea/coffee farmers across South and East India to get their quality produce to be sold at a fair price in the corporate markets.


As a company we do end to end supply of machines and products. Our area of interest is Corporates/Factories, Campuses, HORECA & Exhibition Centers.
name: DWIJA FOODS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
NECTAR KICKS was founded by a

group of likeminded fashion devotees,

determined to deliver style to women

in India. We offer a huge collection

of exquisite and comfortable footwear

Our motto is -

“LOOK GREAT, FEEL GREAT!”

Women are more vulnerable to certain foot

problems than men, mainly from years of walking in

narrow-fitting shoes that squeeze the toes and

from high-heels that cramp the forefoot and pose

risks for arch and ankle problems.

As a solution to these problems, we make sure that

our every product provides unmatched comfort

and topnotch style.
name: Nectar Kicks

idea:
Optyma3D is a Designing and 3D printing Manufacturing organization based in Mumbai, India. 

We expertise in CAD/CAM,3D Printing, Additive Manufacturing, 3D Modelling, Analysis, IT services.

Design-Create-Visualize is what we offer to our customers and take pride in delivering the best to them!
name: Optyma3D

idea: There are large communities in large cities in India & in the changed environment post COVID, communities will use online platforms for their daily home supplies. We have used simple chat technology to facilitate supplies to large & medium sized communities by aggregating requirements on our platform & facilitate supplies at wholesale prices ensuring quality, hygiene, standard & most of all big savings.
name: K Smart Shop LLP
